goals__remit: Lonza is a global leader in the production and support of active pharmaceutical ingredients, both chemically and biotechnologically, as well as in microbial control. Headquartered in Basel, Switzerland, Lonza has more than 40 major manufacturing and R&D facilities and approximately 9,800 full-time employees worldwide. In the EU, Lonza has major sites in the United Kingdom, Spain, Belgium and the Czech Republic.
